desc: Sabina Vineyards is a small, family owned winery that produces world-class, small production, Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. We have a devoted commitment to organic farming and a deep respect for with the land. Sabina Vineyards has become a gathering place for family, friends, ideas and artisanal wines to flourish.

layout.text: A boutique family owned winery in Napa Valley
World-class Cabernet Sauvignon with a devoted commitment to organic farming
